text.section: Notwithstanding any other provision of this subtitle, the Department may adopt boating regulations exclusively applicable to Jennings Randolph Lake.

Regulations adopted under this section:
Shall be developed in coordination with the State of West Virginia;
Shall allow for joint enforcement of boating activities by Maryland and West Virginia authorities in accordance with the Jennings Randolph Lake Project Compact; and
May differ from Maryland boating laws that would otherwise apply.
